content.text: <intR>²Dok is a disciplinary repository for international and interdisciplinary legal scholarship. <intR>²Dok is an open-access-service provided by the Scientific Information Service for International and Interdisciplinary Legal Research established at Berlin State Library and funded by the German Research Foundation. It holds quality-assured research papers, pre-prints and previously published articles.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface, except abstracts, is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The publications and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.

submissionPolicy.text: This repository is intended to hold open-access-publications in the field of international and interdisciplinary legal scholarship written by academic scholars currently affiliated with a university, college or research institute.

eprints.comment: This institutional repository is powered by the MyCoRe repository software, see http://www.mycore.de/ for more information.
